You now have 50 coins in your wallet.

• Download iTAP from the Play Store on your Android mobile phone and win 100 iCoins. • Watch your favourite comedy skits, drama web series, tv shows, mythological series. • Answer simple questions related to the content and win iCoins. • Buy premium content and get 50 iCoins with every film you buy for just Rs.10/-. • Play exclusive games like SnapWin, Pool Prize Spin the Wheel and win iCoins through lucky draw. • Play engaging trivia games pertaining to Bollywood, Cricket Kabaddi and win iCoins. • Use your iCoins to buy discount vouchers. • Win cash everyday - For every 1000 iCoins you stand a chance to get real cash of Rs. 30/- in your account.

Redeem your iCoins to\nwin cash prizes

• Viewers can play exciting BOLLYWOOD TRIVIA game in two modes. 1 = PRACTICE & 2 = 1 ON 1.

 • In the PRACTICE mode, the user can play on his/her own. He/She gets 10 questions in one set and for each correct answer the user scores 1 point.

 • It also has a 1 ON 1 mode, where the user can play with another online participant. If one doesn’t find an online partner, then the user can also PLAY SOLO.

 • In the 1 ON 1 mode, the user has to invest 20 icoins to play with his online opponent.

 • Both the player’s get an opportunity to answer questions alternatively. Whoever wins gets 30 iCoins. The player who loses, doesn’t win anything.

 • The duration to answer the 1st two questions is 30 secs as the game progresses, the duration for giving the answers comes down to 15 secs progressively.

 • You can play this game unlimited number of times, in either modes.

• Viewers can play exciting CRICKET TRIVIA game in two modes. 1 = PRACTICE & 2 = 1 ON 1.

 • In the PRACTICE mode, the user can play on his/her own. He/She gets 10 questions in one set and for each correct answer the user scores 1 point.

 • It also has a 1 ON 1 mode, where the user can play with another online participant. If one doesn’t find an online partner, then the user can also PLAY SOLO.

 • In the 1 ON 1 mode, the user has to invest 20 icoins to play with his online opponent.

 • Both the player’s get an opportunity to answer questions alternatively. Whoever wins gets 30 iCoins. The player who loses, doesn’t win anything.

 • The duration to answer the 1st two questions is 30 secs as the game progresses, the duration for giving the answers comes down to 15 secs progressively.

 • You can play this game unlimited number of times, in either modes.

• Viewers can play exciting KABADDI TRIVIA game in two modes. 1 = PRACTICE & 2 = 1 ON 1.

 • In the PRACTICE mode, the user can play on his/her own. He/She gets 10 questions in one set and for each correct answer the user scores 1 point.

 • It also has a 1 ON 1 mode, where the user can play with another online participant. If one doesn’t find an online partner, then the user can also PLAY SOLO.

 • In the 1 ON 1 mode, the user has to invest 20 icoins to play with his online opponent.

 • Both the player’s get an opportunity to answer questions alternatively. Whoever wins gets 30 iCoins. The player who loses, doesn’t win anything.

 • The duration to answer the 1st two questions is 30 secs as the game progresses, the duration for giving the answers comes down to 15 secs progressively.

 • You can play this game unlimited number of times, in either modes.

Download your favourite videos\nto watch wherever you go without\nthe Internet.
Download your favourite videos\nand watch without Internet.

Steps for downloading any videos to watch offline

 1. Download videos and enjoy watching without internet connection.

 2. Click on any video of your choice and go to DOWNLOAD OFFLINE option, Click on DOWNLOAD

 OFFLINE and it gets redirected to browser.

 3. Click on BUY NOW , Select any package.

  Monthly – Rs 25/-

  Quarterly – Rs 79.99/-

  Yearly – Rs 99.99/-

 4. Enter ten digit mobile number to generate OTP.

 5. Enter card details to make payment.

 6. Your downloaded videos will be available in the DOWNLOADS section.
Google Pay, BHIM, PhonePe, Mobikwik, Freecharge, JioMoney, Airtel Money, PayZapp and more
